trans-unit.source: Provides a way to apply a sort expression to an <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> data source object after an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression"></xref> expression is applied.
trans-unit.target: 정렬 식을 적용 하는 방법을 제공는 <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>후 데이터 원본 개체는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression"> </xref> 식이 적용 됩니다.</xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>

trans-unit.source: After a sort operation is performed by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression> expression in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> control, subsequent sort operations can be performed by using the ThenBy class on a different data field.
trans-unit.target: 정렬 한 후 작업을 사용 하 여 수행 됩니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression>식에는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender>제어 후속 정렬 다른 데이터 필드에 ThenBy 클래스를 사용 하 여 작업을 수행할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.ThenBy"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the property of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object to apply the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.ThenBy"></xref> expression to.
trans-unit.target: 속성을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>적용 하는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.ThenBy"> </xref> 식입니다.</xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression> sorts the data on a specified data field.

Subsequent sort operations can be performed on a different data field by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression> the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression.ThenByExpressions%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 다른 데이터 필드에 후속 정렬 작업을 수행할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression>는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression.ThenByExpressions%2A>컬렉션.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression.ThenByExpressions%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression>

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the data field to apply the `ThenBy` sort operation to.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에 적용할 데이터 필드 지정는 `ThenBy` 정렬 작업을 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The property of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object to apply the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.ThenBy"></xref> expression to.
Gets or sets the ordering direction of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> data source object.
trans-unit.target: 정렬 방향을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>데이터 원본 개체입니다.</xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression> is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> control to sort data in ascending or descending order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression>에 사용 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender>컨트롤을 데이터를 오름차순 또는 내림차순으로 정렬 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression>

trans-unit.source: The direction of the sort operation is specified by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression.Direction%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 정렬 작업의 방향을 사용 하 여 지정 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression.Direction%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression.Direction%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ordering direction of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> data source object.
